info.title: Job Tracker API
info.description: A comprehensive job application tracking system API with OAuth support

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or user already exists

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Handle OAuth provider callback and create/link user accounts

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of job applications with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for job title or company name

get.description: Retrieve notes for a job application
